overview: Laima Armaliene is a legendary Lithuanian traveler, known for her fearless journeys, guiding young tourists from Lithuania to the highest mountains around the world. „Mountains to climb“ is a documentary, following her last journey – a three day camp for young tourists which she organized in attempt to share the priceless secrets and lessons of life she has learned over the years while traveling in the mountains. Is she going to be heard by the new generation? This journey will be her hardest mountain to climb.
title: Mountains to Climb
